Texts.Eng:
[LIBERATOR] As a member of the FLF, you have been tasked by a discrete benefactor to unite disparate Floran tribes. This was a bloody task doomed to fail from the start. So what you do with your life now, is up to you.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Can safely consume ^yellow;(GiC) Drysap^reset;,
  +^green;30^reset;% Speed when subjected to ^orange;Gunfire Noise^reset;,
  Health +^green;50^reset;
Texts.Chs:
[解放者]作为FLF的一员，你被一位离散的捐助者指派来团结不同的叶族人部落。这是一项从一开始就注定要失败的血腥任务。所以，你现在要做什么，取决于你自己。

^orange;饮食^reset;：食肉动物

^orange;天赋^reset;：
可以安全饮用^yellow;；（GiC）树液^reset;，
%受^orange;枪声噪音^reset;影响时+^green;30 ^reset;的速度,^reset;，
生命值+^green;50 ^reset;
